text: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَرِزْقٌ كَرِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal saleh, bagi mereka ampunan dan rezeki yang mulia.
